input_text:
Job Title: Freight Technology SDR

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Summary
We’re looking for an entrepreneurial SDR to join us here at Sigma Solve and help us build our freight technology business unit. Since we're in the early stages, you’d work directly with executive leadership to help shape the program’s future. 
What We Do
Sigma Solve is a global IT Solutions company with over 200 developers globally. With a unique ability to align our creative, technology, and marketing acumen with clients’ strategic goals, Sigma Solve has generated measurable results for a global base of enterprises, governments, and associations over the past two decades. 
Our current offerings include custom eCommerce, custom freight technology solutions (TMS, CRM, Load Boards, etc), CMS, staff augmentation and mobile solutions for the enterprise.
Job Responsibilities
This is an outbound SDR role responsible for prospecting and new lead generation. You’d use a variety of prospecting channels including:
Cold CallingCold EmailingTrade Shows, Events and In-Person NetworkingLinkedIn and/or other Social Media Platforms 
This is a highly consultative sales process with ACVs ranging from 30-150K. You’d be selling a mixture of professional services, products, and technology consulting to our Transportation & Logistics clients.
Background Must Haves 
Software industry understanding (SaaS, software development, AI/ML, RPA, etc)An understand of how APIs work and ability to read / interpret API documentationTransportation Industry Knowledge (Freight Brokerages, Carriers, Shippers, etc)The ability to translate technology into business value
Please do not apply if you don’t have experience selling technology to transportation & logistics companies or at least 1-3 years of relevant experience in the space, as this is a non-negotiable for the role.
Also - this is a fairly technical SDR role, in the sense that you’ll be working with and discussing next generation technologies on a daily basis. If that isn’t you then it’s not a good fit!
CS or related degree is a plus but not a requirement.
Character Must Haves
EntrepreneurialPositiveHungry Attention to detailHard Working Adaptable
Benefits
401(k)401(k) matchingDental InsuranceHealth insurancePaid time offVision insurance
Work Location
5 days per week remote
Travel Requirement
Up to 30-40% travelExpect to attend at least 1 transportation trade show per month1-2 times per year, we host GTM team meetings in our Atlanta or Florida office

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Freight Technology SDR
output_json.summary: Join Sigma Solve's freight technology business unit as an entrepreneurial SDR.
output_json.travel_requirements: Up to 30-40% travel, attending at least 1 transportation trade show per month, 1-2 times per year GTM team meetings in Atlanta or Florida office
output_json.company_information: Global IT Solutions company with over 200 developers globally, specializing in custom eCommerce, freight technology solutions, CMS, staff augmentation, and mobile solutions.
